channel.title: Admin and mod?
channel.description:
Can sum1 give me a
makeadmin command
and
makemod command
THanks.

item.title: Admin and mod?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Did you compile? Hopefully your not signing onto two accounts, then it won’t work. If you are doing that.

Sign out of the account you want to make an admin or mod, and then log back in on that account, DO NOT log out of the account making the person an admin or mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin and mod?
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:6, topic:159569”][quote author=woofdawg23 link=topic=217287.msg1890752#msg1890752 date=1195714287]
i don’t like manually. It lags server when i go threw all that crap.
[/quote]

You must have a really gay computer. Anyways Here:

Add in your owner commands or whatever it is for you.

if(command.startsWith("giveadmin")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } else if(command.startsWith("givemod")) { String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 1; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Oh and also, doing manually is gay as well. So that makes you gay, whoever said it.(not homosexual way)[/quote]code doesnt work =\

Read full topic

I just got mines off my server, so i cheated =S.

item.title: Admin and mod?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:7, topic:159569”]Try this, I’m not near a Server so I don’t really know.

// Make mod command.
else if(command.startsWith(“makemod”) && playerRights >= 2) {
String newMod = command.substring(7);
int ID = server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(newMod);
client a = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
a.disconnected = true;
a.playerRights = 2;
}
// Make admins command.
else if(command.startsWith(“makeadmin”) && playerRights >= 2) {
String newMod = command.substring(7);
int ID = server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(newMod);
client a = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
a.disconnected = true;
a.playerRights = 3;
}

Try that.[/quote]

I don’t think it would work, not sure though. Since it disconnects the player first, it won’t have time to change the playerRights, therefore not working, but who knows. Give both a try.

Read full topic

if(command.startsWith("giveadmin")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } else if(command.startsWith("givemod")) { String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 1; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
